vb16:147.1: pariye → paricchede (bj); paricce (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | sammutiñāṇaṃ → sammatiñāṇaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
vb16:175.1: anekadhātu nānādhātulokaṃ → anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ lokaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
vb16:256.2: Pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ saṃvarantassa → pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutassa (si, sya-all), pāṭimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutassa (pts-vp-pli1ed), ka-sī, csp1ed, csp2ed
vb16:365.2: nirayagāmī”ti → nirayagāminīti (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | tiracchānayonigāmī”ti → tiracchānayonigāminīti (bj); tiracchānagāminīti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | pettivisayagāmī”ti → pettivisayagāminīti (bj); pittivisayagāminīti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
